readable.title: 2592711202_55f8c64495
readable.content: A girl dressed in blue enjoys a blue treat while putting her white shoe back on . A girl in a blue dress sitting on the ground eating cotton candy . A girl in a blue dress takes off her shoes and eats blue cotton candy . Child in blue dress holding sandal in one hand and eating blue cotton candy with other hand . The girl in a blue dress is eating some blue cotton candy with one shoe off and one shoe on .
